name: Disable Featured Image for The Events Calendar
author: WPExplorer

sections.description:
Adds a customizer setting under the Events Calendar > Single Event to disable the featured image display on events globally as well as a new meta option on each event (right under the featured image setting) to disable the post featured image only on specific events.

This plugin was developed due to high requests from our Total Theme users wishing to disable the default featured image displayed by the Events Calendar Plugin which unfortunately isn’t a setting included in the plugin but it may be added later. So before activating this plugin you may want to check first to see if the plugin developers have already included an option for this.

Important

This plugin works with The Events Calendar by Modern Tribe, Inc. But is in no way associated with or sponsored by Modern Tribe, Inc.
sections.installation:
1. Go to your WordPress website admin panel
  2. Select Plugins > Add New
  3. Search for “The Events Calendar Optional Featured Image”
  4. Click Install
  5. Activate the plugin
